Santa_Clara.Westgate Center:
Westgate Center (or Westgate Shopping Center) is a 640,000 sq ft (59,000 m2) regional shopping center located in the West San Jose neighborhood of San Jose, California. The mall is located at the intersection of Saratoga Avenue and Campbell Avenue.


== Ownership ==
The current owners are Federal Realty Investment Trust, who also own Santana Row and Old Town Center in Los Gatos.
